page.title: 03SCHOOL LIFF, LANELLY HILL
page.content: about a week. We have play for 20 minutes and sometimes we can go down the bottom yard. The games I like to play are rugby, football and tennis,I like playing these games very much. I like doing P.E.because it is fun, sometimes you can do handstands and lots of things like that.We sometimes do piggy-back races but I hardly ever win them. We go to Nant-y-Glo swimming baths with the school for swimming lessons.I am in the deep-end.We sometimes do swimming galas. We are going to collect some caterpillars and keep them until they are butterflies and we will let them go. That is what our school is like and does.
